item.title: Three common mistakes you should avoid when starting with Web Page Resources in ASP.NET
item.description: This is a list of of three common mistakes made by developers who start using Web Page Resources in ASP.NET. 1. Not using the right format for the name of a local resources fileThe format of the name of a local resources file should be: PageName.PageExtension.resx. If you don’t add the page extension (Aspx, Ascx), you will get the Exception “The resource object with key ‘PageTitle’ was not found.". 2. Not adding an App_LocalResources folder to each subfolderEach subfolder must have it’s own App_LocalResources folder, else ASP.
